Package com.mineinjava.quail.pathing

Class PathFollower

java.lang.Object
com.mineinjava.quail.pathing.PathFollower
public class PathFollower extends Object
class that helps you follow paths

  • Method Details

    • calculateNextDriveMovement

      public RobotMovement calculateNextDriveMovement()
      Calculate the next movement to follow the path This does return a field-centric movement vector. It does not limit acceleration (yet)
      Returns:
      the next movement to follow the path

    • isFinished

      public Boolean isFinished()
      returns true if the robot is finished following the path.

    • setPath

      public void setPath(Path path)
      Update the path to follow This exists so that you can reuse the path follower between autonomous paths and movements.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to follow
